experience.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
details: Architected and led development of a multi-tenant, cloud-native analytics platform processing over 2M daily API calls with horizontal scalability and automated fault recovery.
Designed a domain-isolated architecture improving data integrity and achieving 99.99% uptime SLA.
Integrated AI-driven predictive UX for real-time form assistance and contextual recommendations, increasing task completion rates by 42%.
Implemented event-driven communication pipelines that improved throughput by 55%.
Built an enterprise-grade UI component library aligned with accessibility standards, accelerating frontend delivery by 30%.
Established CI/CD pipelines with automated testing, code scanning, and container security, reducing release regressions by 78%.
Mentored a 6-member engineering team, introducing modular monorepo workflows and DDD principles.

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
details: Delivered high-performance web applications serving 1.2M+ daily active users with optimized data fetching and caching strategies.
Led backend modernization from monolithic to microservice-based architecture, cutting deployment times by 90% and downtime by 35%.
Designed a hybrid API gateway for improved data delivery efficiency, reducing latency by 45%.
Implemented secure authentication and session management integrated with enterprise identity systems.
Developed AI-assisted tools for automated ticket summarization and intent recognition, reducing support time by 40%.
Improved test coverage to 92% through automation and integrated QA pipelines.
Partnered with DevOps to achieve zero-downtime blue-green deployments.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
details: Modernized legacy systems into modular, component-based architectures, improving load times by over 80%.
Engineered data processing APIs for financial analytics, handling high-volume data streams with optimized throughput.
Created reusable UI and API component libraries adopted across multiple internal teams.
Introduced AI-powered accessibility and search features, improving task success rates by 38%.
Built automated CI/CD workflows ensuring parity between staging and production environments.
Implemented organization-wide code quality and testing standards, improving maintainability by 25%.

experience.title: Junior Full stack Developer
details: Developed enterprise-grade applications for government and finance clients with complex approval workflows.
Optimized data queries and database structures, improving report generation speeds by up to 85%.
Implemented secure API architectures with SSO and full audit logging.
Automated build and deployment processes through integrated CI pipelines.
Introduced full-stack observability with centralized logging and performance metrics.

education.school: University of Science and Technology of Hanoi - USTH
